text: salamdeul-i geudaeege yeoseong-ui saenglie gwanhae mudgeodeun ineun kkaekkeushan geos-i anila illeogalodoe saenglijung-eissneun yeoseong-gwa meollihago saengliga kkeut nal ttaekkaji gakkai haji malla geuleona saengliga kkeutnass-eul ttaeneun gakkai hala ineun hananim-ui myeonglyeong-inila ha nanim-eun hangsang hoegaehaneun jawa hamkke iss-eumyeo cheong-gyeol-eul gippeohasinila
